title: Legacy Course Catalog
cleaned_text: Legacy Course Catalog NUR 319 - Alternative And Complementary Therapy |Effectivity:||08/21/2006 - Fall 2007 *** @ Purdue course examines the principles, practices and outcomes of select alternative healing and complementary therapies The influences of diverse cultural groups, from both the West and East, are examined in relationship to healing practices. Students will apply evidence-based criteria, including research findings from the National Institutes of Health (NIH)- National Center for Complementary and Alternative Medicine, to evaluate the risks end benefits of selected Flag:||NO| Fall 2007 *** indicates the course was still an active course and was transferred to the Banner Catalog effective Spring 2008. This course was not expired Fall 2007.
